moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 a6 4. Bxc6 dx: The exchange Rui Lopez. Threatening the e5 pawn.
moves.5... Bg4: ? Black has a double pawn but the 2 bishops. The main move is f6
moves.7. g4 Bg6 8. Nxe5 Qd4 9. Nf3: ! e4 can't be taken due Re1
moves.12. Nh4 Bh7 13. Nb3 Qe5 14. f4 Qb5 15. f: ? Kf6! blocking the f pawn and attacking the Queen.
? Now black losses. g5! can resist some more time.

opening: Ruy Lopez (C69), exchange variation, Alapin gambit
